come by.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to manage to get something that is rare or difficult to get
come by.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: How did you come by these pictures?
Jobs were hard to come by.
come by.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make a short visit to a place on your way to somewhere else
come by.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He said he’d come by later.
I’ll come by the house and get my stuff later, OK?
